attributes.action: Do not lower or remove the £20,000 annual cash ISA allowance
attributes.additional_details: Fundamentally, we believe the current limit is fair and provides flexibility.
attributes.background: We think it is vital the British people have the flexibility to save or invest their money in the way they see fit. We think that many people may be risk averse to investing in stocks and shares ISAs, want to have a safer vehicle to store their funds, and not want to invest long-term.
